name: One Stop SEO
author: Fahad Bin Zafar

sections.description: In an effort to provide all requried tools at one place Currently Available funtionalities includes Sitemap verification, robots.txt verification, canonicalization verification and provides list of all urls in website, Domain Authority/ page authority check, Google speed score test. More Tools and features coming soon.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->One Stop SEO screen to configure the plugin
sections.faq:
Is the Plugin Free

Yes the plugin in free. I wanted to support my SEO community so the plugin is free of cost.

How Will you earn?

I am doing job. This plugin is to ease SEO processes.

How can I appreciate You for your work?

You can buy me a coffee if you like. Visit: https://www.buymeacoffee.com/faddies
sections.changelog:
2.4.0

Updated API Link.

2.3.0

Added Option to update Meta Title.

2.2.0

AddGoogle Tag configuration options in site tools:
– Google Tag mnager Configuration.
– Google Analytics Universal code Configuration.
– Google Analytics GA4 code Configuration.
– Google Search Console Verification code.

2.1.1

Minor Css Bug fixed.

2.1.0

Updated Features. Added Following:

  • All Pages Tab to show all pages.

    • Edit Page Link.
    • Edit meta feature [coming soon].

  • Check Status Tab: To check website’s vitals.
    Including:
    – Domain Authority
    – Page Authority
    – Robtos.txt
    – Sitemap.xml
    – Canonicalization check
    – Google Speed Score

  • Site Tools Tab: Will be adding more features soon.
    Including:
    – 404 page redirection.

1.0.1

  • First stable Release

1.0.0

  • Beta Release
